import.ERROR_OPEN_TEXTURE_MAP: Failed to open the texture map file.
import.ERROR_DECODE_COLORMAP: Failed to decode the colormap image.
import.ERROR_NON_SQUARE_COLORMAP: The colormap image is not square.
import.ERROR_READ_TILES: Failed to read tiles or no tiles found.
import.ERROR_NO_TILE_FILES: The tiles folder contains no tile files.
import.ERROR_INVALID_TILE_RESOLUTION: The tile resolution in the filename is invalid.
import.ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_TILE_RESOLUTION: The tile resolution is not supported.
import.ERROR_COLORMAP_RESOLUTION_MISMATCH: The colormap resolution does not match the expected resolution.
import.ERROR_BACKUP_FAILED: Failed to create a backup of the tiles.
